name: Invisibility Bubble, Giant
components: V, S, M (needle from a sea urchin)
area: 10-ft..-radius emanation centered on the touched creature's space
text: This functions as per invisibility bubble, but the bubble is larger, which allows you to target a creature of up to size Gargantuan, or allows more creatures into the bubble.
area_zh: 以接触到的生物为中心, 10尺半径弥漫
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 该法术的功能类似于隐形气泡，但气泡更大，这让你可以把体型最大为巨型的生物当作法术目标，或者让更多的生物进入气泡。
